quest.name: Ridin' Hazards
journal:
Maru has a mitey problem for you.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
objectives: Survey the area from the designated location and defeat the starmites that appear.

dialogue.name: MARU
dialogue.text: You know what a starmite is, right? Those hulkin' bugs? Well, they're on my blacklist now!

dialogue.name: MARU
dialogue.text: I got chased by one the other day over by the old Hamsa Hatchery. My hippo startled so badly, I thought for sure I was goin' overboard...

dialogue.name: MARU
dialogue.text: The starmites themselves ain't as dangerous as the fear they instill in our poor hippos, but a hazard's a hazard. Think you could lend us your hand of judgment an' cull the buggers?

dialogue.name: MARU
dialogue.text: You remember those starmites you squashed? Well...they're bein' avenged.

dialogue.name: MARU
dialogue.text: It's hard to tell what's more shaken─our sweet hippos' hearts or our cargo. Either way, all that's waitin' for us on those roads is bugs an' sorrow...

dialogue.name: MARU
dialogue.text: You've gotta help us, Forename. Head back over to the Perfumed Rise an' reunite those starmites with their maker...

dialogue.name: MARU
dialogue.text: You're a savior, Forename! We can ride easy now, knowin' there are fewer starmites on the roads...

dialogue.name: MARU
dialogue.text: Bein' chased is bad enough, but if we were to hit one at any speed, the cart would be wrecked an' the darlin' hippo injured─if not worse.

dialogue.name: MARU
dialogue.text: Safe ridin's no trivial thing, so I might ask for your help smashin' starmites again sometime. Thanks for always lookin' out for us.
